AMAPLAST® RED RP

  • Solvent Red 179
  • Dyestuff Type: Perinone
  • CAS Number: 6829-22-7
  • Lightfastness: Masstone: 8; Tint: 6
  • Melting Point: 249-252°C
  • Heat Stability: 370°C for 5 minutes
  • Suitable Resins: ABS, PBT, PC, PET,  PMMA, and PSU
